Package index

All functions

hviPlotR-package
hviPlotR package for plotting standard graphics for manuscripts and presentations using R and the ggplot2 package.
makeFootnote()
Create a footnote for figures.
nonparametric
nonparametric survival estimates
parametric
parametric survival estimates
save.hviplotr()
Generic save function for hviplot objects
save_ppt()
Function for saving a ggplot object, or list of ggplot objects to a powerpoint document for presentations.
theme_dark_ppt()
Theme for generating powerpoint figures
theme_manuscript()
Theme for generating manuscript figures
theme_poster()
Theme for generating poster figures through powerpoint
theme_ppt()
Theme for generating powerpoint figures
